sentences.sContent: Mark, you've got a good wife. You ought to take care of her.
sentences.sCn: 马克，你娶了个好太太，应该好好照顾她啊。

trans.tranOther: You use ought to to mean that it is morally right to do a particular thing or that it is morally right for a particular situation to exist, especially when giving or asking for advice or opinions.
